system.description: This spell turns a healthy Huge oak into a protector. The tree must be within 10 feet of your dwelling, within a place sacred to you, or within 300 feet of something you wish to guard. A triggering phrase of up to one word per caster level is placed on the oak. When triggered, the tree animates as a treant. Only one tree can be affected at a time. If dispelled, the tree takes root immediately; if released by you, it tries to return to its original location before taking root.
